comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] It's interesting you say that, I think you may have just solved the mystery! I suspect that the photographs were taken IN Nagoya not on board the P&O Liner NAGOYA. Also, these images are part of a series that includes this one, notice his cap?
